DIOKR.visualization.visualization_utils module

DIOKR.visualization.visualization_utils.plot_results(str_score: str, train_loss: List, valid_loss: List, valid_score: List, train_score: Optional[List] = None) → None

str_score: Title for second plot (ex: F1 Score, Hamming Loss, IOU) train_loss: List of train loss accross epochs valid_loss valid_score train_score
